recipes.title: Vanilla Pound Cake
ingridients: 1 packet of cream pudding with sugar
instructions: Melt the butter, then let it cool down.
Mix dry ingredients together: flour, baking powder, instant pudding.
Separate egg yolks from egg whites.

Beat egg yolks with xylitol/regular sugar and vanilla sugar along with a pinch of salt (about 4 minutes on low speed in a Thermomix), add milk, pour in the melted butter, and mix for another 10 seconds on the lowest speed until a smooth mixture forms.
Beat egg whites until stiff, VERY IMPORTANT!
Pour the mixture of egg yolks into the bowl with dry ingredients and mix thoroughly.
Gently fold in the beaten egg whites.
recipes.bakingInfo: Bake for 50 minutes at 180 degrees Celsius, top and bottom heat mode in oven.
recipes.note: After 50 minutes, insert a wooden stick and check if it's ready (it should be slightly moist). Open the oven door and leave for 10 minutes. Then let it cool.
